# 官网

http://css3pie.com/ (opens new window) PIE.htc (opens new window)

# 代码

.box {
    margin: 40px 0 0 50px;
    width: 100px;
    height: 100px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    behavior: url(PIE.htc);
    overflow: hidden;
    border: 2px solid #fbe5a7;
    background: #000;

    // 这个比较重要
    position: relative;
    z-index: 0;
}

img {
    border-radius: 50%;
    behavior: url(PIE.htc);
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
}

<div class="box"><img src="1.jpg"></div>
